definitions.definition: Doing something professionally , for a living ( generally said of something that is not a commonplace job, e.g. criminal activity ) .
Synonym of serial ( “ doing something regularly ” ) .

main_definition: Doing something professionally , for a living ( generally said of something that is not a commonplace job, e.g. criminal activity ) .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) Synonym of serial ( “ doing something regularly ” ) .
